thread.title: Kareena to sign Pak movie by Shoaib Mansoor
thread.title_full: Kareena to sign Pak movie by Shoaib Mansoor

title: Kareena to sign Pak movie by Shoaib Mansoor
text:
Kareena to sign Pak movie by Shoaib Mansoor 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Monday 19th October, 2015 
Bollywood actress Kareena Kapoor Khan is all set to star in acclaimed Pakistani director Shoaib Mansoor's upcoming project. 
Sources have revealed that the 35-year-old actress will travel to Dubai next week to meet Mansoor for a formal script narration and to sign the contract, reports the Express Tribune. 
The rumours were confirmed by Kareen's spokesperson in a statement. 
Insiders revealed that Mansoor had e-mailed his concept to the 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' star and added that she liked the role, but wanted to hear the script before confirming. 
Kareena will be the first A-list actress to work in a Pakistani project. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
